title: Project-Based Cultural Proficiency (CP) Enhancement Training for Corporate Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience in understanding organizational diversity
context.additional_context: Simulation and team collaboration projects reflecting the work environments of in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of cultural proficiency (CP) and analyze case studies addressing health disparities in science fields
Learners can write self-reflection reports and establish improvement plans based on implicit bias test results
Through project-based collaboration, learners can propose methods to enhance cultural empathy metrics and develop actionable strategies applicable to real work
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
